episodes.title: Episode 1 – The Truth
episodes.description: The ‘Church-With-No-Name’ has flown under the radar for more than a century but today is making headlines the world over. Why? Serious allegations of the worst kind and, according to former members, a failure from leadership to deal with the alleged perpetrators. There are hundreds of comments on message boards across multiple websites and social media platforms but no one wants to go on the record. So what are they afraid of? Do the members of this fellowship simply want to live a quiet and devoted life? Or are they hiding for a reason?
